addPublisher(address).details: register a Publisher into the system

addRelayer(address).details: Register a relayer to process transactions for onboarding

addSubscriber(address).details: register a Subscriber into the system

initialize(address).details: Initialize method to set the owner when using a Upgradable proxy

params._owner: address of the owner of the contract

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

removeRelayer(address).details: Remove a relayer from the registry

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

sumExpendedGas(address,uint256).details: sum gas expended by a relayer

params._expendedGas: expended Gas on a relayed trx

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

addRelayer(address).notice: a relayer can be used to process trx of new users with no ether @param _relayer Relayer account address

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

userdoc.notice: This contract purpose is to show the Upgradable Proxy contract functionality
